segments.text: Can I give you a lift home , Mrs Word ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is very kind of you , Mr Lee . Thank you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could you hold my umbrella when I get my keys out , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . It ’ s a terrible night , isn ’ t it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Dreadful . There , the door is open now .
segments.speaker: S1
